Flicker/Phoenix/Skyblaze::

"It is," Skyblaze answers before anyone else has a chance.  "I sensed 
the death of one of these ... Maximals, as you call them."

Phoenix recovers from the surprise before Flicker does, but she has 
no idea what to say.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Starstorm:
> 
> "Is right the roumor that a maximal was dead inside the base ???" 
> said without emotion Starstorm
>
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >        He shrugs idly.  "Whatever you say."  He takes a sip of 
his 
> drink.  "I 
> > really can't say what their status is.  If you'll recall I was 
> unconscious 
> > for most of the battle so I don't know who is still functioning 
> properly, I 
> > left the Maximal base without going inside and the battle wasn't 
> over.  So 
> > all I can tell you is that they're probably planning a frontal 
> assault to 
> > recapture Night... Blackstorm.  You probably have a short time 
> before they 
> > get themselves organized."  He tosses his head back and finishes 
> his drink.  
> > "The fighting will be fierce but it shouldn't be anything we 
can't 
> handle."
